        void setReceiptPreferenceToken(String receiptPreferenceToken)
        method to set the receiptPreferenceToken
        Parameters:
        receiptPreferenceToken - - a token to be provided to the server to send a receipt to the saved destination or to associate an email address with this card for future transactions.
